numbered_ace_sentences: 1. You should return on Friday.
2. On Friday, we will reveal a free link to an article.
3. The article includes this graph.
4. The reveal includes a summary of the topic.
5. The reveal includes additional questions.
6. The reveal includes shout-outs for some of the best headlines for the graph.
7. The reveal includes Stat Nuggets.
8. Stat Nuggets are definitions of words.
9. These words relate to the graph.
10. The reveal includes information about where you can find these words in the graph.
11. The next graph will be released by Friday, February 2.
12. Live-moderation will be on Wednesday, February 7.
13. The topic is 2023 global temperatures.
14. Sharon Hessney signs off.
15. Sharon Hessney is from Boston.
16. Sharon Hessney was a legacy applicant.
17. Andee Rubin signs off.
18. Andee Rubin is from Cambridge, Mass.
19. Andee Rubin was the first person in her family.
20. Andee Rubin went to college away from home.
